subject: Baseball
Football
Television
lead_paragraph: Joe Buck will return to the booth for the baseball postseason, but being Fox’s top N.F.L. announcer is the priority, especially in a season in which Fox will broadcast the Super Bowl.
snippet: Joe Buck will return to the booth for the baseball postseason, but being Fox’s top N.F.L. announcer is the priority, especially in a season in which Fox will broadcast the Super Bowl.
